summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the Seattle Comprehensive Plan by adding a Cultural Resources Element and making associated amendments to the other Plan Elements; amending Shorelines Policies in the Land Use Element to add goals regarding the Lower Duwamish Watershed Habitat Restoration Plan; adding goals and policies to the Land Use Element regarding tree preservation and enhancement; making minor technical amendments to the Future Land Use Map; and updating Health Department information in the Capital Facilities Element Appendices, as part of the City's annual Plan amendment for 1997.
